seo.title: Things to Do in Monterosso 2025 | Activities & Experiences
seo.description: Best things to do in Monterosso. Beaches, hiking, boat tours, wine tasting, and exploring the old town.

body.title: Things to Do
body.subtitle: From sandy beaches to mountain hikes. The most activities of any Cinque Terre village.

features.title: Beach Day
features.description: Relax on the only sandy beaches in Cinque Terre. Swim in crystal-clear water.

features.title: Hike to Vernazza
features.description: Most scenic Blue Trail section. 2 hours through terraced vineyards.

features.title: Boat Tour
features.description: See all five villages from the sea. Sunset cruises available.

features.title: Wine Tasting
features.description: Local Sciacchetr√† and white wines. Visit cantinas and agriturismi.

features.title: Old Town Walk
features.description: Explore medieval streets, churches, and hidden piazzas.

features.title: Fresh Seafood
features.description: Try local anchovies and fresh catches at harbor restaurants.
